words.source: H4872 (Mosheh, proper noun) with conjunctive waw prefix; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Now Moses'
H7462 (ra'ah, Qal active participle ms) 'to tend/pasture/shepherd'; KJV 'kept', ESV 'keeping', NASB 'pasturing'
H853 ('et, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H6629 (tso'n, noun common both singular construct) 'flock/sheep'; KJV/ESV 'flock', NASB 'flock'
H2859 (choten, Qal participle ms construct + 3ms suffix) 'father-in-law'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'his father-in-law'
H3548 (kohen, noun common ms construct) 'priest'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'priest of'
H5090 (nahag, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to drive/lead'; KJV 'led', ESV 'led', NASB 'led'
H853 ('et, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H6629 (tso'n, noun common both singular absolute with definite article) 'the flock'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the flock'
H310 ('achar, preposition) 'behind/beyond/west of'; KJV 'to the backside of', ESV 'to the west side of', NASB 'to the west side of'
H4057 (midbar, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'wilderness/desert'; KJV 'the desert', ESV/NASB 'the wilderness'
H935 (bo', waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to come/enter'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'and came'
H2022 (har, noun common ms construct) 'mountain/hill'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the mountain of'
H430 ('Elohim, noun common mp absolute with definite article) 'God'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'God'
H2722 (Choreb, proper noun with directional he suffix) 'Horeb'; KJV 'even to Horeb', ESV/NASB 'Horeb'
